event.title: Sustain Podcast: Velda Kiara on her Open Source Journey
event.metaTitle: Sustain Podcast: Velda Kiara on her Open Source Journey
event.metaDesc: Sustain Podcast: Velda Kiara on her Open Source Journey
event.content: On the [Sustain podcast](https://podcast.sustainoss.org/), [Velda Kiara](https://veldakiara.notion.site/Velda-Kiara-46aec24028fd4e8dbdba003097c18b5b) explores open source advantages, hurdles, engagement with Black Python Devs, and her enriching journey participating in programs like Djangonaut Space.
